You will recall that at the last meeting of the entire
In-School Committee we talked about trying to get sane special
school programs ready for distribution and hoped that we could
get materials from other countries as well as our own. The en¬
closed copies of letters indicate that our efforts are beginning
to pay off.
Also in New York some of you joined us to talk with Dr.
Randall concerning the types of programs we could use if they
were directed to young people. We have just heard his two pro¬
grams in the new series, THIS IS A FRIENDLY WORLD and can recom¬
mend them highly. They are well done sofar as content is con¬
cerned and the technical quality is much better than last years*
seriea I hope this series is offered fcy one of the school or
